description.english: On Guilt, achieve 5 stars without double jumping on normal difficulty.
On Shock, achieve 5 stars without shooting.

displayName.english: No, Mr. Bond, I expect you to die!

description.english: On Guilt, achieve at least 4 stars without allowing the laser to leave the screen.
On Blame, achieve at least 2 stars without destroying any turrets.
On Despair, complete the level by switching no more than 30 times.
On Despair, complete the level without existing longer than 20 seconds total in the water dimension.
On Shock, collect the second secret without double jumping.
On Shock, collect the third secret by jumping off the rail and landing back on it.
On Minimisation, run through the sweeping lasers by holding right the entire time, collecting the secret, without taking damage.
On Minimisation, move backwards through the sweeping laser section without taking damage.
On Minimisation, achieve 5 stars without shooting.
On Blame, run through the second sweeping lasers section and following platforms by holding right the entire time, collecting the secret, without taking damage.
On Blame, complete the long laser ladder by jumping and without taking damage.
On Delusion, reach the blue vertical stripe by holding right the entire time and without taking damage.
On Delusion, pass the first ladder without touching it.
On Delusion, pass the laser after the rail secret without double jumping, without taking damage, and by landing safely on the upper screen.
On Despair, complete the final section without landing in the pit, and collecting the secret.
On Remorse, achieve 5 stars without jumping off a rail.
On Remorse, achieve 5 stars without shooting.
On Remorse, complete the first disappearing platform section spending fewer than 3 seconds in the water dimension.
On Panic, kill the first enemy before he fires a shot on hardcore difficulty.
On Panic, achieve 5 stars without shooting any flyers.
On Panic, return to the moving platform after not touching it for at least 25 seconds.
On Rejection, complete the floating section without shooting, without taking damage, and collecting the secret.
On Rejection, complete the final jumping section backwards.
On Rejection, complete the floating section in less than 10 seconds, without taking damage, and collecting the secret.
On Distress, kill all the enemies in the open floating section without taking damage.
On Distress, climb the final steps section without shooting and without taking damage.
On Distress, complete the open floating section without shooting, without taking damage, and collecting both secrets.
On Isolation, achieve 5 stars, killing everything (including mines).
On Isolation, during the rail section near the end of the level, only use one rail without taking damage.
On Isolation, collect the final secret without jumping.
On Spite, complete the vertical jump section without the heat meter rising above 50%, and collecting both secrets.
On Spite, complete the vertical jump section without destroying the mine, and collecting both secrets.
On Spite, achieve at least 2 stars without the heat meter rising above 50%.
On Rage, achieve 5 stars without shooting.
On Rage, achieve 5 stars without the heat meter rising above 50%.
On Rage, compete the sweeping triple laser section in 2 sweeps of the lasers without taking damage.
On Vengeance, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.
On Vengeance, complete the triple bridge section by holding right the entire time, without taking damage.
On Vengeance, complete the long run and jumping section without the heat meter rising above 50%, and collecting the secret.
On Torment, achieve 5 stars without the heat meter rising above 50%.
On Torment, achieve 5 stars without killing any small flyers.
On Torment, cross the final platform, reaching the end of it 5 seconds before the moving platform arrives, without taking damage, and collecting the secret.
On Confusion, achieve 3 stars without jumping or double jumping.
On Confusion, achieve 4 stars without destroying any mines or crawlers.
On Confusion, switch 25 times during the final sweeping lasers section without taking damage.
On Optimism, complete the switch section by only activating 3 out of the 4 switches, and without taking damage.
On Optimism, reach the first checkpoint without double jumping, and without taking damage or dying.
On Optimism, collect the second secret without double jumping.
On Hope, achieve 4 stars without killing anything except flyers.
On Hope, achieve 4 stars, destroying all mines.
On Hope, complete the final 2 disappearing platform jump sections without shooting, and without taking damage.
On Forgiveness, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.
On Forgiveness, achieve 3 stars, performing only one jump or double jump.
On Forgiveness, complete the six switch section by only triggering one switch without taking damage.
On Guilt, pull 5 seconds ahead of the laser.
On Alienation, achieve 5 stars without destroying any turrets.
On Alienation, reach the first ladder without touching any of the floating platforms, and without taking damage.
On Alienation, travel from the first ladder back to the start of the level without taking damage.
On Depression, achieve 5 stars without moving vertically.
On Depression, achieve 5 stars without taking any damage.
On Depression, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.
On Pity, achieve at least 4 stars only switching once.
On Pity, destroy the 4 turrets within 4 seconds.
On Pity, destroy the second phase of the boss within 3 iterations of the laser.
On Suffering, achieve 5 stars without taking any damage.
On Suffering, spend at least 12 seconds in the final crusher section.
On Suffering, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.
On Hate, destroy every laser without taking damage.
On Hate, complete the first 2 phases only switching once without taking damage.
On Hate, achieve 5 stars without moving vertically.
On Regret, reach the shield phase switching no more than twice and without taking damage.
On Regret, kill the boss within 2 iterations of the shield phase without taking damage.
On Regret, kill the boss without shooting in the shield phase and without taking damage.
Complete the first world.
Complete the first world on hardcore difficulty.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the first world.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the first world on hardcore difficulty.
Complete the second world.
Complete the second world on hardcore difficulty.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the second world.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the second world on hardcore difficulty.
Complete the third world.
Complete the third world on hardcore difficulty.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the third world.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the third world on hardcore difficulty.
Complete the fourth world.
Complete the fourth world on hardcore difficulty.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fourth world.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fourth world on hardcore difficulty.
Complete the fifth world.
Complete the fifth world on hardcore difficulty.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fifth world.
Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fifth world on hardcore difficulty.
Defeat the first boss.
Defeat the second boss.
Defeat the final boss.
Complete the game.
Complete the game on hardcore difficulty.
Achieve 5 stars on every level.
Achieve 5 stars on every level on hardcore difficulty.
